title: Ticket #6409: keep count of idle, running and held jobs in cluster object and report
description:
The SCHEDD should keep running totals of idle, running, & held procs in a cluster, and report those totals when returning the cluster ad to a condor_q query.

condor_q should be enhanced to print those totals when it gets a -factory query.
remarks:
2017-Oct-20 10:31:41 by johnkn:
added condor_q -factory. this is a work in progress, and the name is tentative. it shows late materialization factories, and summaries of materialized jobs. 

> condor_q -factory
-- Schedd: submit-4.chtc.wisc.edu : <128.105.244.190:9618?... @ 10/20/17 10:29:09
 ID         OWNER            SUBMITTED  LIMIT PRESNT   RUN    IDLE   HOLD NEXTID MODE DIGEST
4534943.    johnkn         10/20 10:29      6      6      0      6      6      6      /home/condor/spool/4943/condor_submit.4534943.digest

2017-Oct-26 15:54:48 by johnkn:
no version history, this is part of the late materialization work in progress.
